txt.en: This is the location to place the banner
Get the Short One

'In the east, there are goblins who once sailed the seas with us. There is one among them who knows the banner of the lords.\n\n'Go to their camp and plant the banner I give you. This will start a ritual fight between you and the goblin I seek. When you have won, the goblin will come to me. It is their way.'
Challenge the goblin Shakfut Slit-throat in ritual combat
Place Rothog's banner at the ritual circle in Súlstrok to challenge Shakfut Slit-throat to ritual combat
You defeated Shakfut Slit-throat in ritual combat

'It is done! You have beaten me. I will make my way to Jax Phanâl and present myself to TBD.'

The goblins shakes its head.

'Know this though, [placeholder], you have condemned me to a fate worse than death. Let that weigh upon your conscience.'
Stúkha bids you take his banner to a camp in the east where the goblin pirates make their home. Challenge the leader, defeat him, and the goblin will make its way to Jax Phanâl.

'You will find the goblin encampment of Súlstrok to the south-east in the shadow of the cliffside. Search within the camp for the ritual circle. Plant the banner I gave you and defeat the leader in ritual combat. When it is done return to me.'

You are to head south-east to Súlstrok, an encampment of goblins once loyal to the Corsairs. Once there, you are to plant the banner given to you to call forth one of the strongest goblins. This will enable a ritual combat. Win, and the goblin will surrender to the emissary in Jax Phanâl.
'I sent Shakfut on to the city. He will make a great fighter in the gladiator pits. You have done well and earned your reward.'
Defeat the goblin, Shakfut Slit-throat
With Shakfut Slit-throat defeated you can now return to Rothog's emissary in Jax Phanâl and inform him of your victory.
Defeat the Goblin Shakfut Slit-throat in ritual combat
'I yield. I will report to Rothog for punishment and a life in the pits.'
Place Rothog's banner at the ritual circle
You cannot place the banner here
Place Rothog's banner at the ritual circle
Defeat Shakfut Slit-throat in ritual combat
Rothog's banner is placed
You defeated Shakfut Slit-throat in ritual combat
'Another victim for the pyres!'
'A challenge? With Rothog's banner, no less. Very well. I will honour the ritual, gut you like a fish and slit your throat to fill our bellies.\n\n'This will prove a wonderful exercise.'
You were defeated by Shakfut Slit-throat
Rothog's banner is placed
